LittleDog API Reference Manual

1.1.2

Introduction

This document is a reference manual for the programming interface to the Boston Dynamics LittleDog robot.

The API includes all functionality needed to read state information from the robot, as well as to query the motion capture system for readings. Using the API, users can control a remote robot in real-time by sending new setpoints and servo settings to the robot as desired.

Software Installation

The LittleDog software comes in multiple parts:

  • The LittleDog API, to be installed on a Linux host
  • Windows tools for looking at generated data, to be installed on a PC
  • The Vicon motion capture software, pre-installed on Windows XP PC

Changes

See the change logs page for a description of changes made prior to this software version release.
